house_listing.house_description: Rare find! 2 year new transitional hm w/'old beach' look. 9' ceilings on 1st floor. Wood flr in foyer & liv room.Huge kit w/maple cabinets & marble-look countertop. Wrap around front porch. Back deck. Tons of curb appeal!Master bath w/jetted tub, sep shower, tiled floor.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Contemporary Style, Fenced, Foyer,Pantry, Walk-In Closet(s)
